title: GEL's Breakup, A Bad Week For DISTURBED & Other Top Stories You Might've Missed This Week
description: Plus an odd Rush cancellation. The post GEL's Breakup, A Bad Week For DISTURBED & Other Top Stories You Might've Missed This Week appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
text: This week's top stories include an insane Gel breakup, a mystery Rush cancellation, Disturbed having a pretty crap week, and more! Check out those stories at the links below and don't forget to check out our Top Tracks Of The Week playlist on Spotify here and on Apple Music here. Also, don't forget to check out Metal Injection's Band Of The Month Imperial Triumphant! GEL Cancels All Shows, Breaks Up & Accuses Guitarist Of Horrific Behavior RUSH's ALEX LIFESON & GEDDY LEE Agreed To Play BLACK SABBATH's Farewell Show Until "Other Things Came Up" DISTURBED's Pyrotechnics Damaged Six Of The Chicago Bulls' NBA Title Banners BABYMETAL Announces North American Tour With BLACK VEIL BRIDES, JINJER & BLOODYWOOD IRON MAIDEN's STEVE HARRIS Recalls Firing BLAZE BAYLEY And The Aftermath The Bear's MATTY MATHESON & ALEXISONFIRE's WADE MACNEIL Have A New Band DISTURBED's DAVID DRAIMAN Is Suing His Landlord MASTODON's New Record Will Not Feature BRENT HINDS GUNS N' ROSES Parts Ways With Longtime Drummer FRANK FERRER The Upcoming LAMB OF GOD Record "Won't Take Five Years To Come Out" Want More Metal? html:
This week's top stories include an insane Gel breakup, a mystery Rush cancellation, Disturbed having a pretty crap week, and more! Check out those stories at the links below and don't forget to check out our Top Tracks Of The Week playlist on Spotify here and on Apple Music here. Also, don't forget to check out Metal Injection's Band Of The Month Imperial Triumphant!

  1. GEL Cancels All Shows, Breaks Up & Accuses Guitarist Of Horrific Behavior
  2. RUSH's ALEX LIFESON & GEDDY LEE Agreed To Play BLACK SABBATH's Farewell Show Until "Other Things Came Up"
  3. DISTURBED's Pyrotechnics Damaged Six Of The Chicago Bulls' NBA Title Banners
  4. BABYMETAL Announces North American Tour With BLACK VEIL BRIDES, JINJER & BLOODYWOOD
  5. IRON MAIDEN's STEVE HARRIS Recalls Firing BLAZE BAYLEY And The Aftermath
  6. The Bear's MATTY MATHESON & ALEXISONFIRE's WADE MACNEIL Have A New Band
  7. DISTURBED's DAVID DRAIMAN Is Suing His Landlord
  8. MASTODON's New Record Will Not Feature BRENT HINDS
  9. GUNS N' ROSES Parts Ways With Longtime Drummer FRANK FERRER
  10. The Upcoming LAMB OF GOD Record "Won't Take Five Years To Come Out"
